dits.title: TypeMismatch, [] value assigned to String
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 22 (tests/fail.dit)
String test = ['cat'];
                     ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign List to String

dits.title: TypeMismatch, '' value assigned to List
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 27 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf String test = 'cat';
                          ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign String to List

dits.title: TypeMismatch, String var assigned to List
dits.dit:
String test = 'cat';
listOf String test2 = test;
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 27 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf String test2 = test;
                          ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign String to List

dits.title: TypeMismatch, List var assigned to String
dits.dit:
listOf String test = ['cat'];
String test2 = test;
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 20 (tests/fail.dit)
String test2 = test;
                   ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign List to String

dits.title: TypeMismatch, '' assigned to class
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 10 (tests/fail.dit)
A = 'dog';
         ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign String to Class

dits.title: TypeMismatch, String var assigned to class
dits.expected:
Line: 3 Col: 9 (tests/fail.dit)
A = test;
        ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign String to Class

dits.title: TypeMismatch, '' assigned to dit
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 12 (tests/fail.dit)
dit = 'dog';
           ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign String to Dit

dits.title: TypeMismatch, String var assigned to dit
dits.expected:
Line: 3 Col: 11 (tests/fail.dit)
dit = test;
          ^

TypeMismatchError: Cannot assign String to Dit

dits.title: TypeMismatch, listOf String had class
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 35 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf String value = [class {{}}];
                                  ^

TypeMismatchError: List of type 'String' contained 'Class'

dits.title: TypeMismatch, listOf Class had string
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 29 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf Class value = ['dog'];
                            ^

TypeMismatchError: List of type 'Class' contained 'String'
